comment: Tree Widget: changed `CategoriesTreeComponentProps`, `ClassificationsTreeComponentProps` and `ModelsTreeComponentProps` to now accept optional viewport of `TreeWidgetViewport` type. It will be used instead of the `Viewport` from `@itwin/core-frontend`. Also, changed `TreeToolbarButtonProps`, `useCategoriesTreeButtonProps`, `UseCategoriesTreeProps`, `UseClassificationsTreeProps`, `useModelsTreeButtonProps` and `UseModelsTreeProps` to accept `TreeWidgetViewport` instead of `Viewport`. To migrate, use `createTreeWidgetViewport` and provide previously used `Viewport` from `@itwin/core-frontend`.
